title: [Plat+] Looking for a Supper Main

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
I only play  {{champion:104}}  and I'm looking for a Plat or higher support to duo with.
I'd prefer it if you'd play  {{champion:40}}  only though.

If you'd like to duo with me add me, IGN: Nou

replies.body: arent we all looking for a super man?
